alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Habersham; Hart; Rabun; Stephens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 30 at 3:00PM EDT until November 01 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures from 20 to 25 across the mountain valleys, and from 28 to 32 across the Piedmont and foothills. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Georgia, Piedmont and western North Carolina and upstate South Carolina. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
